Entry.JapaneseText: あちこちで起こってる争いを止めないと 大変な事になるんだよな？
Entry.EnglishText: Something bad's going to happen if we don't stop all this fighting, right?
Entry.Notes: Hilda: We need to go everywhere since we can't let that happen! (<- line currently missing)

Entry.JapaneseText: そうならないためにも 急いで各地を回るしかないわね！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to head to any place where conflict has arisen so that won't come to pass!
